name: Tricky Temple (itch)
description:
Platforms: WebGL and Android

Controls:  WASD or Arrow Keys

Have you ever dreamt of being a legendary Tomb Raider like Indiana Jones or Lara Croft? Do you enjoy the thrill of one wrong step being your potential failure? In “Tricky Temple” you enter dark temple rooms and have to make your way to the other side, collecting treasures on the way. But as soon as you step into the level, darkness falls and you have to watch your every step to make it across alive.  The game features 20 unique levels with more and more dangerous traps. Will you collect all treasures and unlock the hidden grave chamber?

This game was developed as part of the "Game Mechanics and System Design" module at Abertay Univesity, UK. It collects data on specific user behaviours with the help of Game Analytics in order to improve the game.
